br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.serialization

Class RestfulSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.xstream.XStreamXMLSerialization
      • br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.serialization.RestfulSerialization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NoRootSerialization, Serialization, XMLSerialization, View

    @Component
@RequestScoped
public class RestfulSerialization
extends XStreamXMLSerialization
    Custom serialization process provides a way to add links to your resource representations.
    Author:
    guilherme silveira

    • Method Detail

      • getXStream

        protected com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream getXStream()
        You can override this method for configuring XStream before serialization. It configures the xstream instance with a link converter for all StateResource implementations.
        Overrides:
        getXStream in class XStreamXMLSerialization
        Returns:
        a configured instance of xstream
